formElement.label: Configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration. To view or create a new configuration, go to the Administration -> Plugins tab, and select 'Configure' action for @PLUGIN_KEY@ plugin.
formElement.htmlDocumentation:
Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration.
A Configuration defines connection details and can be created by going to plugin configuration page.

formElement.label: Credentials to be entered:
formElement.documentation: The credentials needed to check the status of the page.

formElement.label: Maximum Elapsed Time:
formElement.documentation: Defines the maximum time in seconds that the job will try to check into the server. Blank implies no wait time (URL only checked one time).

formElement.label: Target URL:
formElement.documentation: URL of the page to be checked. (Required)

formElement.label: Success Criteria:
formElement.documentation: Indicates the expected correct result to be obtained when running checking the server.
